title: Ep 32: Shame w/ Andy Haynes
description: I read a very touching email from a recovering heroin addict and the dicussion on shame begins! Andy Haynes is back to share his stories and his refreshing honesty. We discuss ideas from Dr. Brene Brown's book "I Thought It Was Just Me.' You'll be surprised at how many things you think are bizarre and shameful are totally normal.
author: nadav@ymhstudios.com (Christina Pazsitzky)
